title: Cargill is shuttering its High River meat-packing plant after it was linked to more than 350 cases of coronavirus - Financial Post
description:
1. Cargill is shuttering its High River meat-packing plant after it was linked to more than 350 cases of coronavirus  Financial Post
  2. Cargill meat processing plant in High River to be idled after COVID-19 outbreak  CTV News
  3. Cargill To …
content:
CALGARY — The Cargill meat-packing plant in southern Alberta announced Monday it is temporarily shutting down as the result of COVID-19.
The High River facility, which employs about 2,000 workers, has been linked to more than 350 cases of the novel coronavir… [+2717 chars]
